MS.S: Module for creating and displaying Toast Notifications on Microsoft Windows 10.

# 1.1.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Features and Improvements_x000D__x000A_ * Add support for Important Notifications using the Urgent switch._x000D__x000A_ * Add support for setting button colors._x000D__x000A_ * Center align notification body text when using the IncomingCall scenario._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 1.0.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_ * OnActivated events are "sticky"_x000D__x000A_ * See #256 by [Windos](https://github.com/Windos)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 1.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Breaking Changes_x000D__x000A_ * Custom Audio Path Removed: Support for custom audio file sources has been eliminated._x000D__x000A_ * AppId Customization Removed: The ability to specify a custom AppId has been removed._x000D__x000A_ * Shoulder Tap Notifications Removed: Support for "shoulder tap" toast types is no longer available._x000D__x000A_* Features and Improvements_x000D__x000A_ * Create and update all help files._x000D__x000A_ * Enable "Activation" events on all supported versions of PowerShell, including Windows PowerShell._x000D__x000A_ * Enable "Dismissed" and "Failed" events on PowerShell 7.1+._x000D__x000A_ * Improve support for attribution text._x000D__x000A_ * Shortcut Support: Introduced capability to create Windows shortcuts with proper AppUserModelID—enables full toast branding when launching PowerShell._x000D__x000A_ * Event Data Improvements: Event data handling and options improved for notification actions._x000D__x000A_* CI and Repository_x000D__x000A_ * Update Issue and Feature Request Templates._x000D__x000A_* Libraries_x000D__x000A_ * Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref library bumped to 10.0.22621.28._x000D__x000A_ * Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications library bumped to 7.1.3.
Module for creating and displaying Toast Notifications on Microsoft Windows 10.

# 1.1.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Features and Improvements_x000D__x000A_ * Add support for Important Notifications using the Urgent switch._x000D__x000A_ * Add support for setting button colors._x000D__x000A_ * Center align notification body text when using the IncomingCall scenario._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 1.0.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Bug Fixes_x000D__x000A_ * OnActivated events are "sticky"_x000D__x000A_ * See #256 by [Windos](https://github.com/Windos)_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_# 1.0.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Breaking Changes_x000D__x000A_ * Custom Audio Path Removed: Support for custom audio file sources has been eliminated._x000D__x000A_ * AppId Customization Removed: The ability to specify a custom AppId has been removed._x000D__x000A_ * Shoulder Tap Notifications Removed: Support for "shoulder tap" toast types is no longer available._x000D__x000A_* Features and Improvements_x000D__x000A_ * Create and update all help files._x000D__x000A_ * Enable "Activation" events on all supported versions of PowerShell, including Windows PowerShell._x000D__x000A_ * Enable "Dismissed" and "Failed" events on PowerShell 7.1+._x000D__x000A_ * Improve support for attribution text._x000D__x000A_ * Shortcut Support: Introduced capability to create Windows shortcuts with proper AppUserModelID—enables full toast branding when launching PowerShell._x000D__x000A_ * Event Data Improvements: Event data handling and options improved for notification actions._x000D__x000A_* CI and Repository_x000D__x000A_ * Update Issue and Feature Request Templates._x000D__x000A_* Libraries_x000D__x000A_ * Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref library bumped to 10.0.22621.28._x000D__x000A_ * Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.Notifications library bumped to 7.1.3.
